roleset.name: be able to perceive

roles.note: This is not aliased to discern because while the roles are the same, discernable entails the abiltiy to perceive.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to discern.01-v. Discern.01-v is a member of Vn class see-30.1-1 and FN class Becoming_aware. Framed by Katie.

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: The area of local disease in the rectum is barely discernable to this point.
example.arg: The area of local disease in the rectum
